author: Bellular News
description:
Steam's #5 game came from nowhere. Behind it: an $11 billion social media empire operating in plain sight.
Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:57 Two Million Sales, Little Marketing

09:18 Steam Just Changed Forever
